content:
What a thoughtful colleague you are! I'm happy to help you with some gift ideas to show your support and care. Considering you've already got her aromatherapy candles, here are some suggestions that complement your initial gift or offer a different kind of comfort:

1. **Cozy throw blanket**: A soft, plush blanket can be a comforting companion during difficult times. Choose a gentle color and material that will make her feel snug and relaxed. ($20-$30)
2. **Gourmet tea or coffee gift basket**: A soothing cup of tea or coffee can be a great pick-me-up. Put together a basket with her favorite brews, some sweet treats, and a few comforting snacks. ($20-$40)
3. **Book or magazine subscription**: A good book or magazine can be a great distraction and mood booster. Consider a self-care or inspirational title, or a subscription to a magazine that aligns with her interests. ($10-$20)
4. **Relaxing bath and body products**: Building on the aromatherapy candles, you could get her some scented bath salts, body wash, or luxurious body lotion to help her unwind. ($15-$30)
5. **Personalized journal or planner**: A thoughtful journal or planner can help her process her emotions, set goals, and stay organized. Consider a customized one with her name or initials. ($15-$30)
6. **Gourmet food or chocolate gift basket**: Who doesn't love a sweet treat? Put together a basket with her favorite snacks, chocolates, or specialty foods to brighten her day. ($20-$40)
7. **Mindfulness or meditation app subscription**: Help her cultivate mindfulness and relaxation with a subscription to an app like Headspace, Calm, or Insight Timer. ($10-$15 per month)
8. **Flower or plant delivery**: A bouquet of fresh flowers or a low-maintenance plant can bring some joy and serenity to her space. ($20-$40)
9. **Cozy socks or slippers**: Treat her to a pair of soft, comfy socks or slippers to keep her feet warm and toasty during a tough time. ($10-$20)
10. **Gift card to her favorite spot**: A gift card to her favorite coffee shop, restaurant, or store gives her the freedom to treat herself to something special. ($20-$50)

Remember, the thought and care behind your gift are what truly matter. Choose something that feels authentic and comes from a place of kindness.
